md:
giải nghĩa từ "petty" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Petty (adjective)
	* Meaning: (of a problem or situation) not important or serious
	* Vietnamese: không quan trọng, nhỏ nhặt
	* Example sentence: "The petty squabbles between the two teams were distracting from the real issue."
	* Related words: trivial, insignificant, minor

2. Petty (adjective)
	* Meaning: (of a person) having or showing a mean or ungenerous spirit
	* Vietnamese: nhỏ nhen, keo kiệt
	* Example sentence: "He was a petty man who always tried to get the better of others."
	* Related words: mean, stingy, miserly

3. Petty (noun)
	* Meaning: a petty official or officer
	* Vietnamese: quan chức nhỏ, viên chức thấp
	* Example sentence: "The petty officer was in charge of the ship's daily routine."
	* Related words: official, officer, bureaucrat
html:
giải nghĩa từ "petty" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Petty (adjective)

    • Meaning: (of a problem or situation) not important or serious
    • Vietnamese: không quan trọng, nhỏ nhặt
    • Example sentence: "The petty squabbles between the two teams were distracting from the real issue."
    • Related words: trivial, insignificant, minor

  2. Petty (adjective)

    • Meaning: (of a person) having or showing a mean or ungenerous spirit
    • Vietnamese: nhỏ nhen, keo kiệt
    • Example sentence: "He was a petty man who always tried to get the better of others."
    • Related words: mean, stingy, miserly

  3. Petty (noun)

    • Meaning: a petty official or officer
    • Vietnamese: quan chức nhỏ, viên chức thấp
    • Example sentence: "The petty officer was in charge of the ship's daily routine."
    • Related words: official, officer, bureaucrat
